name: Skool Girl Dating Sim
description:
STORY

Generic Protag is an average male student at Gakuen Highschool, and is single and lonely. Join him on his short journey of finding a girlfriend in this (not) dating sim!

CHARACTERS

GAMEPLAY (OR LACK THEREOF)

With amazingly hand-drawn graphics and the super intuitive gameplay of picking one choice out of three (!), Skool Girl Dating Sim leads the player through an incredibly emotional and treacherous path of finding one's soulmate that is sure to relate to our modern society as a whole. 

Now, excuse me while I upload this project for the game jam last minute (I started rushing 3h before the submission time...)

MUSIC CREDITS

Music by ZakharValaha from Pixabay

Music by Music_For_Videos from Pixabay

Music by JuliusH from Pixabay
